   17: 
   18: import dns.immutable
   19: import dns.rdtypes.nsbase
   20: 
   21: 
   22: @dns.immutable.immutable
   23: class CNAME(dns.rdtypes.nsbase.NSBase):
   24:     """CNAME record
   25: 
   26:     Note: although CNAME is officially a singleton type, dnspython allows
   27:     non-singleton CNAME rdatasets because such sets have been commonly
   28:     used by BIND and other nameservers for load balancing."""
